name: SmartPack-Kernel (Nougat-stable-v12_r3)
long_description: SmartPack-Kernel project for Samsung Galaxy S5 (MSM8974) by sunilpaulmathew@xda-developers.com. This is a unified build for SM-G900P/I (code names: kltespr/kltedv). ***Warning*** Please flash this Kernel on your own risk. I will not take any responsibility if something wrong happens to your device.
features: Build from latest Lineage OS source code
Anykernel concept for compatibility with maximum devices
Kernel tweaker app recommend: SmartPack-Kernel Manager, Offical Kernel Auditor
Additional 27 MHz gpu frequency step (idle frequency)

features.name: CPU Governors
items: Intelliactive, Lionheart, Nightmare, Alucard, SmartMax, Intellidemand, zzmove & Adaptive

features.name: I/O Schedulers
items: tripndroid, sioplus, vr, zen, fifo, tripndroi & fiops

features.name: TCP Congestion Controls
items: cubic, reno, bic, westwood, highspeed, hybla, htcp, vegas, scaleable, lp, yea & illinois

downloads.name: stable-v12_r3
changelog: Removed Lazyplug touch boost. Merged all the patched from Anykernel repo. Up-to-date with Linage-OS source code.
